attributes.action: enforce ebay to stop selling tickets to events that are charity fundraisers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ticket touting is bad enough, but touting tickets that have been sold to raise money for a charity, (e.g. Machester versus Cancer, raising money for Christies hospital,) is very low. Effectively touts are profiting from a charity. This could easily be tackled is ebay were to stop selling such tickets.
